text:
@KatiePhang One question in the article stands out:

“How does it feel defending a criminal responsible for the death of 58,471 Americans and counting?”

"Ask the AG :  Barr is taking twitter questions on coronavirus issues"
Fred Barbash, WaPo Apr 30
